label: Task description
name: description
description: A guide telling the user how to answer this task.

label: Import CSV
name: csvImport
description:
Add the words by uploading a CSV-file. Example format: water:w___r,vann:v__n
fire:f__e,ild

important.description:
• Source and target words are separated with a comma (,).
  • Alternative answers are separated with a forward slash (/).
  • You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip.

fields.name: overallFeedback
fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

name: behaviour
label: Behavioural settings
description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.name: caseSensitive
fields.label: Case sensitive
fields.description: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: Require all fields to be answered before the solution can be viewed
fields.name: showSolutionsRequiresInput
acceptSpellingErrors
fields.label: Accept minor spelling errors
fields.description: If activated, an answer will also count as correct with minor spelling errors (3-9 characters: 1 spelling error, more than 9 characters: 2 spelling errors). This option is only valid if the answer mode is set to Fill in

fields.name: enableSwitchAnswerModeButton
fields.label: Enable "Switch answer mode" button
fields.description: Allow the end user to switch between modes "Fill in" and "Drag text".

fields.name: enableSwitchWordsButton
fields.label: Enable "Switch words" button
fields.description: Allow the end user to switch between source and target words.
